1 Prerequisites

To run this project, you need the following:
* Eclipse 3.1m6 
* JRE 1.5.0_02
* Compiler compliance level: 5.0
* Set up EMF_CORE user library (see below)
* Set up JFACE user library (see below)

Previously aspect-1.2 was required; this has now been removed.

1.1 EMF_CORE user library

* java>build path>user libraries
* EMF_CORE
* org.eclipse.emf.ecore_2.0.1/runtime/ ecore.jar, ecore.resources.jar
* org.eclipse.emf.common_2.0.1/runtime/ common.jar, common.resources.jar

1.1 JFACE user library

* java>build path>user libraries
* JFACE
* c:/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.jface_3.1.0.jar
* c:/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.swt_3.1.0.jar
* c:/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.1.0.jar  (or whatever your platform is)


1 Compiling
Should auto-build by itself.
